message.content:
There are several ways to get over a breakup, and the process may look slightly different for everyone. Some tips to help move on after a breakup include:

1. Accept and acknowledge your feelings: Don't suppress or deny your emotions – let yourself mourn the end of the relationship.

2. Talk it out with someone you trust: Share your thoughts and feelings with close friends, family members, or even a therapist if needed.

3. Cut off contact with your ex (at least temporarily): In order to heal properly, it's crucial that you take space from them.

4. Focus on self-care: Make sure you're taking care of both your physical and emotional needs during this time.

5. Rediscover yourself: Take this opportunity to reconnect with hobbies or interests that you might have neglected during the relationship.

6. Practice gratitude: Reflect on positive aspects of your life outside of the relationship to remind yourself that there's more to life than romantic partnerships.

7.Line up new activities and experiences- Taking part in new fun experiences can make healing faster by giving less time for thought about past memories

8.Give it time : Healing takes time , do not overburden yourselves with expectation just give yourselves soemtime too.
  
9.Exercise has alot benefits including boosting mood,self-confidence,this is an easier way create a post break-up routine
  
10.Becoming forgiving towards partner -Because anger doesn’t contribute anything good by impacting own health mentally as well as physically.Forgetting helps in acceptance thus helping forgiving
